```python
    ALIVE_REWARD = 1.0
    DEAD_REWARD = -1.0
    PARTITIONS = 4
    ARROW_DISTANCE = 2
    random_reset=False
    
max_rounds=100000, render_interval=10000

eps_greedy=0.1, reward_decay=0.9, learning_rate=0.05

10 + 0.05 * (1 + 0.9 * 10 - 10)
```

# # 3

```python
    ALIVE_REWARD = 1.0
    DEAD_REWARD = -1.0
    PARTITIONS = 4
    ARROW_DISTANCE = 2
    random_reset=True

max_rounds=100000, render_interval=10000, complete_threshold=100

eps_greedy=0.1, eps_decay=1, reward_decay=0.9, learning_rate=0.03

10 + 0.03 * (1 + 0.9 * 10 - 10)

self.q_table.q_table
```
